channel.title: Hi, I'm Jan from Paymo
channel.description:
Hi there, my name is Jan Lukacs from [Paymo][1], we're based in Romania/EU - a self funded startup that helps people with time tracking, project management and invoicing. I just learned about the forum today and i love the idea. Looking forward to sharing info with y'all. I'm on twitter as @jan_lukacs
[1]: http://www.paymo.biz

item.title: Hi, I'm Jan from Paymo
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Jan. Welcome to the forum!

Read full topic

Hi there,
my name is Jan Lukacs from Paymo, we’re based in Romania/EU - a self funded startup that helps people with time tracking, project management and invoicing. I just learned about the forum today and i love the idea. Looking forward to sharing info with y’all. I’m on twitter as @jan_lukacs
